mapper.select: select p.pay_id, p.pay_date, t.theater_name, DATE_FORMAT(s.screen_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as screen_date, m.movie_nm from pay p join booth b on p.booth_id = b.booth_id join screen s on b.screen_id = s.screen_id join theater t on s.theater_id = t.theater_id join movie m on s.movie_id = m.movie_id where p.member_id = #{id} order by p.pay_date desc
mapper.update: update member set member_name = #{member_name}, member_phone = #{member_phone}, member_gender = #{member_gender}, member_address = #{member_address}, member_profile = #{member_profile} where member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.select: select member_pass from member where member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.update: update member set member_pass = #{member_pass} where member_id = #{member_id}
